text: Data from three or more independent experiments are presented as the mean+ / - standard error of the mean ( SEM ) , except where stated and were compared using GraphPad Prism 4 ( GraphPad Software , http : / / www.graphpad.com ) .

Results were analysed using one - way ANOVA with Newman-Keuls post test except for the data from the in vivo inhaled FP study , which was analysed by Friedman 's test with subsequent Wilcoxson matched pair signed rank sum test .
Data from this analysis are presented as a box-and-whiskers plot .
Friedman 's test was used as three matched measures were obtained using placebo , 100 microg , and 500 microg of inhaled FP , which had variable baseline levels .
We did not assume a Gaussian distribution of the data due to the limited numbers of participants analysed ( seven ) .
The null hypothesis was rejected at p < 0.05 .
